div.div: ​Academic excellence for every student, in every classroom, in every school.

font.a: Taunton Public Schools Coronavirus Communication Page

a.font: Attention Seniors Please See The THS Guidance Page Here For Updates

h2.font: Dear students and families by using Taunton Public Schools remote learning applications you are agreeing to follow the Student and Family Expectations for Remote Learning. Please see the link below for the expectations document. Document Link

div.h2:
​
​Attention Staff and Students Please Log into Your TPS Classlink Portal Here

span.span: Taunton Public Schools Late Start Schedule

a.span: Taunton Public Schools Early Dismissal Schedule

a.font: Bus Routes are available now. Please Click Here to Access.

div.div: There's always a lot going on here in the City of Taunton! Be sure to check out our Virtual Backpack for the latest news about community events, programs, and resources of interest to local youth and families.
​Families and community members: stay connected with the Taunton Public Schools by signing up for the district's email announcement system, the TPS E-News. Click the button below to subscribe.

em.font: ​Taunton Public Schools does not discriminate on the basis of age, color, disability, national origin, homeless status, race, religion, sex, gender identity, or sexual orientation.
